name: Simple Snake (itch) (Yugina)
description:
This is just a basic clone of the classic Snake game made with Godot. I made it mostly to see if I could. It was a learning exercise. The code is not pretty, but that's partly intentional... or so I'd like to say. I based it off of Google's rendition of the game.

You can check out the source code here: https://github.com/Yugina/SimpleSnake

Sound effects source: https://opengameart.org/content/nes-8-bit-sound-effects

Icons source: https://opengameart.org/content/game-icons
